title: WTB: Toronto Ballpark and Seattle Kingdome Postcards
author: icollectDCsports

posts.post_title: WTB: Toronto Ballpark and Seattle Kingdome Postcards
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy:

1.  Postcard showing Toronto's Exhibition Stadium in baseball configuration, preferably during the time the Blue Jays played there.

2.  Postcard showing inside of the Kingdome in baseball configuration for the Mariners.

Please let me know by PM if you have either or both to sell.  

Thank you.
